history.proof: intros a b c. unfold Rmin. destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl. - reflexivity. - hauto lq: on use: Req_le, Rplus_le_compat. - sfirstorder use: Rplus_le_reg_r. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r1 + r <= r2 + r" on hypothesis of type "~ b + a <= c + a".

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r1 + r <= r2 + r" on hypothesis of type "~ b <= c".

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r1 + r <= r2 + r" on hypothesis of type "~ b <= c".

original: intros a b c. unfold Rmin. destruct (Rle_dec b c); destruct (Rle_dec (b + a) (c + a)); simpl. - reflexivity. - apply Rplus_le_compat_r in n. contradiction. - apply Rplus_le_compat_r in n. contradiction. - apply Rplus_le_compat_r in n. contradiction.
